title.narrative: STRENGTHENING STATISTICAL & INFORMATIONSYSTEMS AND EVIDENCE GENERATION

description.narrative: The National Statistics Institute and statistical actors at social ministries at the central and decentralized levels in targeted areas have increased capacity to produce, disseminate and use data for advocacy, planning, monitoring, evaluation and accountability., which contributes to Cross-Sectoral - Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral - Planning And Programme Reviews, Evaluation, Research. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Evaluations, Research And Data, Partnerships And Engagement: Public And Private, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: The most marginalized children, adolescents and young people benefit from evidence-based social and economic policies and social protection programmes that address multidimensional poverty and advance the equitable realization of their rights.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: The National Statistics Institute and statistical actors at social ministries at the central and decentralized levels in targetedareas have increased capacity to produce, disseminate and use data for advocacy, planning, monitoring, evaluation andaccountability.

description.narrative: Le système statistique national a été renforcé grâce à l’enquête nationale sur la mortalité des enfants de moins de 5 ans, après 9 ans de manque de données. En matière de système d&39;information, la mise à jour des indicateurs socioéconomiques du Niger a permis de jeter les bases de la future plateforme digitalisée.; Au niveau décentralisé, l’UNICEF a accompagné le développement d’un système d’information communal afin de disposer de données pour la prise de décisions sur développement local.; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:19/01/2022

title.narrative: Number of actors trained on the use of survey results and data analyzes for social sectors advocacy at critical planning & budgeting moments at regional and municipal (Regional directorates, regional universities, CSOs, media and municipalities) with UNICEF support.(64920)
